content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: POOLID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.132
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when both USUBJID and POOLID are empty
Outcome:
  Message: When POOLID is populated, USUBJID may not be populated
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - POOLID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '132'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: POOLID and USUBJID are mutually exclusive. When POOLID
                  is used, USUBJID will be null and if a USUBJID is recorded, the
                  POOLID will be null.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '8.5'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when both USUBJID and POOLID are empty

Outcome.Message: When POOLID is populated, USUBJID may not be populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: POOLID and USUBJID are mutually exclusive. When POOLID is used, USUBJID will be null and if a USUBJID is recorded, the POOLID will be null.
